answerText: Silver Spring monkeys[10] This species of monkey was a particular favorite of Harry Harlow's, who used them in such unnerving experiments as the "pit of despair."
heading: QUARK |2012 | 1 | 21 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: For 10 points each, name some controversial primates: [10] These 17 macaques were photographed in abominable conditions by PETA founder Alex Pacheco. Edward Taub made important progress in the study of neuroplasticity by severing these monkeys' afferent ganglia.
